short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes Donald Trump related news from your facebook news feed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
On Facebook and want a break from knowing what Donald Trump has been up to recently? Or just don't want to see his name everywhere?

With this extension, you can do the following with your Facebook news feed:
1) Replace the words Donald, Trump, Melania and Ivanka with your own carefully selected words. Makes scrolling through political news a little bit more fun.
2) Replace the Facebook post with an image of your choice. How about cats?
3) Don't want to see any mention whatsoever in your news feed? Hide all offending posts with this option.

Please note that this does not work for the Trending News sidebar, links or if the post only contains a photo of the above mentioned people.

Have a bug? Report it at coding.at.desk@gmail.com.
